name: @salahor/websocket-server
description: Salahor WebSocket Server - Production-ready WebSocket server implementation

scripts.ws:start: node -e "const WebSocket = require('ws'); const wss = new WebSocket.Server({ port: 4002 }); console.log('WebSocket server running on ws://localhost:4002'); wss.on('connection', ws => { console.log('Client connected'); ws.send('Welcome!'); ws.on('message', msg => { console.log('Received:', msg.toString()); ws.send('Echo: ' + msg); }); });"
scripts.ws:test: node -e "const WebSocket = require('ws'); const ws = new WebSocket('ws://localhost:4002'); ws.on('open', () => { console.log('Connected to server'); ws.send('Hello!'); }); ws.on('message', msg => console.log('From server:', msg.toString()));"
scripts.load-test: artillery run --output load-test-report.json load-tests/websocket-load-test.yml && artillery report load-test-report.json

author: Salahor Team
